raw akas.title: Ο Μπλέιζ και οι Φίλοι του

akas: Blaze and the Monster Machines (original title)
Blaze und die Monster Maschinen Germany
Ο Μπλέιζ και οι Φίλοι του Greece
Blaze y los Monster Machines Spain
akas from release info: Blaze and the Monster Machines (original title)
Blaze und die Monster Maschinen Germany
Ο Μπλέιζ και οι Φίλοι του Greece
Blaze y los Monster Machines Spain

1.title: The Chicken Circus

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Blaze, AJ, and Darington are in the front row for the amazing Chicken Circus. But when Crusher accidentally launches the chickens far, far away, it's up to Blaze and Darington to get their feathered friends back to the big top.

2.title: The Pickle Family Campout

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: When all the members of Pickle's family (Jim Rash, Judy Greer, Steve Little, Chris Parnell, Stephanie Courtney, and Wendi McLendon-Covey) get lost in the woods, Pickle teams up with Tow Truck Blaze to come to their rescue.

3.title: Robot Power

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: When Crusher unleashes three of his most destructive creations on Axle City, there's only one hero strong enough to save the day: Robot Blaze.

4.title: Breaking the Ice

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: When a little bunny (Jenna Dewan Tatum) gets trapped on top of a melting glacier, Blaze must put his new robot powers to the test as he races to the rescue.

5.title: Robots to the Rescue

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: When three big emergencies turn out to be too much for one truck alone, Blaze turns himself and his friends into super strong robots to save Axle City from a runaway train, an overflowing glue factory, and an erupting volcano.

6.title: The Super Size Prize

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: At the Axle City Fair, Blaze and AJ realize they don't have enough coins to use the new Supersize Prize Machine. So to earn money, Blaze gets three different jobs, transforming into super-cool vehicles to take care of business.

7.title: T-Rex Trouble

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: Blaze and Zeg are in Dinosaur Valley, showing off their amazing robot powers to their dinosaur friends. But when they discover three lost little Tyrannosauruses, they must use their robot powers to get the babies home safely.

8.title: Meatball Mayhem

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: When Crusher accidentally knocks a bottle of "grow spice" onto a meatball, it grows to an enormous size and rolls away. It's up to Blaze and Pickle to transform into robots and stop the meatball before it wrecks the entire town.

9.title: Robots in Space

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: When Space Commander Megan (K. Megan McArthur) is marooned on Pluto, our robot heroes will race through wormholes, shoot past ice volcanoes, and blast straight through an asteroid field to bring their new friend back home.

10.title: Power Tires!

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: When his tires get popped, Blaze thinks he's out of the race for good. Luckily, Gabby is there with a new set of Power Tires - high-tech wheels that can transform into anything Blaze needs to keep rolling.

11.title: Ninja Blaze

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

11.plot: Ninja Master Blackbelt is training Blaze and AJ to be powerful ninjas when Crusher and Pickle accidentally launch themselves onto an icy mountain! Now Blaze and AJ must use their new ninjas skills to rescue them.

12.title: Snow Day Showdown

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

12.plot: It's a snowy day in Axle City, and every truck in town is lining up for a delicious winter warm-up: hot chocolate. But when Crusher tries to take all the hot chocolate for himself, Blaze is in hot pursuit to get it back.

13.title: Construction Crew to the Rescue

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

13.plot: Blaze, Starla and Stripes turn into a bulldozer, crane, and excavator to help a Pizza Chef build a restaurant. But when they're done, the team gets a call from Crusher and Pickle, who have built themselves the tallest, coolest, rickety-est tower-with no way to get down. Blaze and his construction pals et off rescue the trapped trucks, using their heavy-lifting abilities to overcome any obstacle in their way.

1.title: Blaze of Glory

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Blaze and AJ are introduced to the world of racing Monster Machines.

2.title: The Driving Force

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: When Starla loses one of her pistons, Blaze and AJ must get it for her before Crusher can take it.

3.title: Tool Duel

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Gabby is the mechanic all the Monster Machines in town count on to fix them up. But when Crusher steals all her tools, Gabby needs Blaze's help to get them back!

4.title: Bouncy Tires

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: When Zeg tries on a new set of tires, he bounces out of control. Blaze and AJ have to figure out how to stop him.

5.title: Epic Sail

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Crusher's sail boat race leaves Blaze and the machines stranded.

6.title: Stuntmania

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Darington has built the ultimate stunt-track, and every Monster Machine in town is coming to see the show! But when a jealous Crusher tricks Darington and sends him far, far away, it's up to Blaze and AJ to rescue him.

7.title: The Jungle Horn

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: Stripes loves his jungle horn, a special instrument that can summon all the animals in the jungle. But when a jealous Crusher steals it, Blaze and Stripes must speed after him in a wild chase to get it back.

8.title: Team Truck Challenge

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: It's the day of the Team Truck Challenge, a race where all the trucks get to compete in teams of two! But when Crusher chooses a new partner instead of Pickle, his disappointed sidekick teams up with Blaze to prove his mettle.

9.title: Cake-tastrophe

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: When a hungry Crusher accidentally turns the baker truck's baker bots to messy mode, they sprout wheels and drive away! It's up to AJ and Blaze to track down all the rampaging robots before Axle City is blanketed in baked goods.

10.title: Truckball Team-up

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: Blaze discovers an exciting new sport called Truckball. But when Crusher and his team of cronies challenge him, Blaze must scour all of Axle City to put together a Truckball team before the big game.

11.title: The Mystery Bandit

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

11.plot: A metallic trophy is swiped from Blaze, so he searches for the bandit who took it.

12.title: Gasquatch

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

12.plot: Blaze and AJ are deep in the woods when they discover and befriend a mud-loving monster truck named Gasquatch. Now, they must set out on an epic adventure to bring their new friend to Mud Fest... the muddiest party of all time.

13.title: Truck Rangers

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

13.plot: Blaze and his friends join the Truck Rangers, a scouting club where trucks earn badges for their accomplishments.

14.title: Trouble at the Truck Wash

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

14.plot: Blaze and AJ must track down the missing pieces of Gabby's Truck Wash and rebuild it so their friends can get clean.

15.title: Zeg and the Egg

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

15.plot: Zeg, Blaze and AJ find a tiny dinosaur egg and try to return it to its mother.

16.title: Runaway Rocket

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

16.plot: When Crusher tries to cheat at a carnival game, he accidentally strands himself and Pickle on a giant rocket.

17.title: Cattle Drive

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

17.plot: When Blaze and Starla encounter a herd of cows wandering in the desert, they embark on a wild west adventure to bring the cows back to Starla's barn.

18.title: Dragon Island Duel

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

18.plot: It's the day of the Dragon Island Duel, a one-on-one race between Blaze and Crusher around tropical Dragon Island. But when Crusher cheats and sends Blaze away before the race, AJ must set out to rescue his best friend and bring him back to the starting line.

19.title: Sneezing Cold

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

19.plot: Gabby, Blaze and AJ are out in the wilderness when they get a call - Blaze's friends have come down with a sickness called the Sneezles! Our heroes must race back to Axle City to bring the sick trucks the medicine oil they need.

1.title: Fired Up!

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: When Blaze smells smoke at Axle City's garage, he calmly and courageously leads his friends outside to safety. Axle City's fire chief is impressed with Blaze's courage and thinks maybe he has what it takes to be a fire fighter.

2.title: Dino Dash

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Blaze and AJ are playing with their friend Zeg when he accidentally gets blasted by a geyser into a far away mud pit. It's up to Blaze and AJ to save him, using engineering design inspired by their new dinosaur-truck friends.

3.title: Truck or Treat

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: It's Halloween in Axle City, and Blaze, AJ, and all of their friends are excited to "Truck or Treat." But when Crusher tries to steal all of their candy, his plan goes awry, and he sends their treats far away from Axle City.

4.title: Race to the Top of the World

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Blaze and his friends compete in the most epic race in history. They meet pirates and the Sphinx on a whirlwind world-tour. But when Crusher throws them off course, Blaze and pals must persevere to make it to the finish line.

5.title: Piggy 500

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: It's the day of the Piggy 500, and Starla is teaming up with her prize pig, Zippy, to race. But when her competitor Crusher and his rude pig, Slop, cheat and send Zippy far away, it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Starla to find him and get back to the race in time.

7.title: Knight Riders

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: A light thief is on the loose, leaving all of Axle City in the dark! Gabby outfits Blaze with special lights to help him track down the light thief and restore the missing lights.

8.title: Monster Machine Christmas

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: It's Christmas Eve, and Blaze and AJ are helping Santa load his magic bag of presents to deliver all over the world. But Crusher accidently knocks over the bag and sends the presents flying.

9.title: Darington to the Moon!

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: Today Darington will attempt his biggest stunt yet: rocketing to the moon! But there's just one problem. His battery-powered rocket is out of energy. To get to the moon Blaze must help Darington recharge his battery.

10.title: Spark Bug

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: Blaze, Stripes, and AJ are racing through the jungle when Stripes discovers a lost little fire beetle named Sparky. Blaze and his friends set off across the jungle to help Sparky get back home to the top of a red hot volcano.

11.title: Five Alarm Blaze

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

11.plot: There's a fire on the bridge, and it's too much for the Fire Chief and his team to handle. They need Firefighting Blaze to help. With time running out, Blaze hurries across town. But can he get to the bridge in time?

12.title: Axle City Grand Prix

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

12.plot: Axle City Grand Prix: Gabby has the perfect tool to get Blaze ready to race: a special remote that can control any machine. But when Crusher takes her remote, he activates machines all over town to slow Blaze down.

13.title: Treasure Track

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

13.plot: Blaze, AJ, and Gabby join Pegwheel the Pirate-Truck for an island treasure hunt! Following their treasure map, the friends search jungle beaches and mountains to find where X marks the spot.

14.title: Rocket Ski Rescue

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

14.plot: Crusher's Grammy is in town to watch Crusher and Blaze race at the Monster Dome. But when Crusher tries to cheat using rocket skis, his plan backfires, blasting him off the racetrack and across Axle City. Now Blaze must team up with Grammy to rescue Crusher.

15.title: Dinosaur Parade

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

15.plot: Blaze, AJ, and lots of spectators have gathered to watch herds of dinosaurs march through Axle City! But when Crusher pushes his way into the parade, he scatters dinos everywhere, and it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Zeg to find and rescue them.

16.title: Race Car Superstar

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

16.plot: Blaze and AJ visit VelocityVille, a town full of race cars where everybody loves to go fast. But when a snooty car named Speedrick traps all the other racers, Blaze must transform into a super-fast race car to free his new friends.

17.title: Race to Eagle Rock

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

17.plot: Blaze brings all of his monster truck pals to VelocityVille for a wild race to the top of Eagle Rock. But Crusher will stop at nothing to beat race car Blaze and friends, setting traps to slow them down.

18.title: Sky Track

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

18.plot: Swoops the helicopter loses his rotor, and without it he can't fly! It's time for Blaze and AJ to retrieve the runaway rotor, adventuring up onto The Sky Track, an amazing course that weaves through the clouds.

19.title: The Wishing Wheel

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

19.plot: Blaze, AJ, and Stripes are searching for the Wishing Wheel: a magical treasure that will grant a wish for one lucky race car. But with chomping, stomping, and slithering dangers at every turn, can Blaze and his friends stay on track?

20.title: Pickle Power

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

20.plot: Crusher builds a super-powered vacuum to clean up his big mess - but the machine goes haywire, sucking up Crusher and everything in its path! Now Pickle must team up with Blaze and AJ to stop the vacuum and save Crusher.

1.title: Dinocoaster

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Zeg has a ticket to ride a brand new dinosaur roller coaster: the Dinocoaster. But when the ticket blows away, it's up to Blaze to help his buddy track it down and get back to the amusement park in time.

2.title: The Hundred Mile Race

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Blaze visits VelocityVille to compete with his new racecar pals in the longest race ever: the Hundred Mile Race. But Crusher is racing too, and he'll do anything to win.

3.title: The Polar Derby

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Blaze and his friends head to VelocityVille and transform into racecars for the Polar Derby, a wintry race through the snow. But when racecar Crusher knocks them off-course, the pals must keep cool to stay on track.

4.title: Light Riders

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: A light thief is on the loose, leaving all of Axle City in the dark. Gabby outfits Blaze with special lights to help him track down the light thief and restore the missing lights.

5.title: Catch That Cake!

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: It's Darington's birthday. Crusher uses a robot plate to try and steal the birthday cake, but his plan goes awry and the cake goes rocketing away. Will Blaze catch the runaway cake before Crusher and save the party?

6.title: The Bouncing Bull Racetrack

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Blaze and Starla discover a map that leads to a track of legend - the Bouncing Bull Racetrack. The friends set out on a Wild West quest to find the track and take the ride of their lives.

7.title: Mega Mud Robot

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: Gasquatch is back. He's been saving up his money to buy the ultimate toy - a Mega Mud Robot. But when his coins go missing, it's up to Blaze to help his mud-loving friend recover them before the toy store closes.

8.title: Knighty Knights

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: In the kingdom of knight-trucks, Blaze discovers a machine his medieval pals use to recharge. But when a dragon snatches the charging station, Blaze leads a quest to recover the machine before everyone in the kingdom runs out of energy and falls asleep.

9.title: Animal Island

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: Blaze and Stripes are sailing the open sea when they discover Animal Island - an incredible place where everyone is a talking monster truck animal. Ashore they make lots of new friends and marvel at the animals' amazing powers. But meanwhile a greedy lizard wants those powers all for himself - and steals them using a special machine. Blaze and Stripes set off to track down the lizard and his machine. Along the way, the heroes will transform into awesome animals to beat the bad guy and get the powers back where they belong.

10.title: Toucan Do It!

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: Blaze, Starla, and Darington can't wait to play every animal's favorite sport: Jungle Ball! But when their teammate Tooks the Toucan gets launched from the stadium, it's up to the friends to get her back in the game.

11.title: Falcon Quest

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

11.plot: In the sky above Animal Island, a remarkable race is about to begin. But before Blaze can join, he must spread his wings. Challenged by a tough-talking falcon (Darius Rucker), Blaze takes off on an aerial journey to earn his place with the fastest fliers.

12.title: The Big Ant-Venture

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

12.plot: Blaze and Zeg discover the teeny tiniest creatures on all of Animal Island - the insects. The pals shrink down to size, transforming into a super-strong ant and a bouncy grasshopper to enter a miniature insect city. Inside they meet a firefly couple and their baby egg. When a sudden gust of wind sends the egg rolling away in its stroller, Blaze and Zeg volunteer to chase the runaway egg through the underground world and get it back before it hatches.

13.title: Ready, Set, Roar!

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

13.plot: Blaze and Stripes transform into ferociously fast jungle cats to race in the Animal Island Championship. But to win, they'll have to beat Crusher disguised as a cheating cheetah. Can they claw their way to victory?

14.title: The Great Animal Crown

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

14.plot: When the Great Animal Crown is lost at the bottom of the ocean, Blaze transforms into a super-fast shark to retrieve it for his Animal Island friends. But he'll have to swim fast - or Crusher may get to the crown first.

15.title: Tow Truck Tough

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

15.plot: Blaze transforms into a tow-truck - and, with the help of AJ and Gabby, sets off on a tow-tally awesome adventure to save Stripes.

16.title: Race for the Golden Treasure

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

16.plot: Blaze and Pegwheel the Pirate have teamed up for the ultimate treasure hunt. Together they must find three keys to unlock a special chest. But Crusher's sailing the high seas too, and he'll do anything to get the treasure first.

17.title: Need for Blazing Speed

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

17.plot: When Crusher tries to get Blazing Speed for himself, he accidentally sends Blaze's engine flying. Now it's Blaze vs. Crusher in a race for Blazing Speed-but without an engine, Blaze must find new ways to propel himself to victory.

18.title: Fast Friends

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

18.plot: Blaze, AJ, and Gabby meet a brand new monster machine named Watts - a super fast truck with electric tires. But when one of her special tires goes rolling into the jungle, Blaze, AJ, and Gabby promise to help her get it back.

19.title: Defeat the Cheat

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

19.plot: It's the second ever Team Truck Challenge - a big race that pairs trucks together in racing teams. And this time Blaze's teammate is...Crusher? Will Crusher be able to resist his cheating ways to win for the very first time?

20.title: Raceday Rescue

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

20.plot: It's race day, and Crusher is cheating twice as hard to beat Blaze and Watts - sending both drivers far, far away. But Blaze and Watts are determined to save AJ and Gabby and get back to the race in time to win.

episode of.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (TV Series 2014– )

imdb.plot outline: AJ is an 8-year-old techie who drives monster-truck Blaze, the top racer in Axle City. The two go on adventures that have them taking on problems involving science and math. Many predicaments they face are caused by Blaze's rival, Crusher, a tractor-trailer that will do anything to beat other vehicles to the finish line. The animated series is billed as the first TV show for preschoolers to comprehensively cover areas of science, technology, engineering and math. Each episode introduces different STEM concepts, including buoyancy and trajectory.
imdb.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
plot: AJ is an 8-year-old techie who drives monster-truck Blaze, the top racer in Axle City. The two go on adventures that have them taking on problems involving science and math. Many predicaments they face are caused by Blaze's rival, Crusher, a tractor-trailer that will do anything to beat other vehicles to the finish line. The animated series is billed as the first TV show for preschoolers to comprehensively cover areas of science, technology, engineering and math. Each episode introduces different STEM concepts, including buoyancy and trajectory.

Blaze, AJ and their monster truck friends Zeg, Starla, Darington and stripes go on adventures and solve everyday problems while using math, science and physics. Crusher most of the time makes bad choices and is followed by his friend pickle.
